scripts.build:dev: NUXT_ENV_BUILD=dev nuxt build --mode test && rm -rf ../functions/nuxt/* && rm -rf ../public/* && cp -r ./.nuxt/ ../functions/nuxt/  && cp -r ./.nuxt/dist/client/ ../public/_nuxt &&  cp -r static/. ../public/
scripts.build:staging: NUXT_ENV_BUILD=staging nuxt build --mode test && rm -rf ../functions/nuxt/* && rm -rf ../public/* && cp -r ./.nuxt/ ../functions/nuxt/  && cp -r ./.nuxt/dist/client/ ../public/_nuxt &&  cp -r static/. ../public/
scripts.build:prod: NUXT_ENV_BUILD=prod nuxt build --mode test && rm -rf ../functions/nuxt/* && rm -rf ../public/* && cp -r ./.nuxt/ ../functions/nuxt/  && cp -r ./.nuxt/dist/client/ ../public/_nuxt &&  cp -r static/. ../public/
